verses.verse: בָּרֲכִ֥י <WH1288> Bless נַפְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> O my soul אֶת־ <WH853> יְה֫וָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> O LORD אֱ֭לֹהַי <WH430> my God גָּדַ֣לְתָּ <WH1431> great מְּאֹ֑ד <WH3966> thou art very ה֭וֹד <WH1935> with honour וְהָדָ֣ר <WH1926> and majesty לָבָֽשְׁתָּ׃ <WH3847> thou art clothed

עֹֽטֶה־ <WH5844> Who coverest א֭וֹר <WH216> [thyself] with light כַּשַּׂלְמָ֑ה <WH8008> as [with] a garment נוֹטֶ֥ה <WH5186> who stretchest out שָׁ֝מַ֗יִם <WH8064> the heavens כַּיְרִיעָֽה׃ <WH3407> like a curtain

הַ֥מְקָרֶֽה <WH7136> Who layeth the beams בַמַּ֗יִם <WH4325> in the waters עֲ‍ֽלִיּ֫וֹתָ֥יו <WH5944> of his chambers הַשָּׂם־ <WH7760> who maketh עָבִ֥ים <WH5645> the clouds רְכוּב֑וֹ <WH7398> his chariot הַֽ֝מְהַלֵּ֗ךְ <WH1980> who walketh עַל־ <WH5921> upon כַּנְפֵי־ <WH3671> upon the wings רֽוּחַ׃ <WH7307> of the wind
עֹשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> Who maketh מַלְאָכָ֣יו <WH4397> his angels רוּח֑וֹת <WH7307> spirits מְ֝שָׁרְתָ֗יו <WH8334> his ministers אֵ֣שׁ <WH784> fire לֹהֵֽט׃ <WH3857> a flaming

יָֽסַד־ <WH3254> add אֶ֭רֶץ <WH776> of the earth עַל־ <WH5921> upon מְכוֹנֶ֑יהָ <WH4349> the foundations בַּל־ <WH1077> that it will not תִּ֝מּ֗וֹט <WH4131> [that] it should not be removed עוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> forever וָעֶֽד׃ <WH5703> and ever

תְּ֭הוֹם <WH8415> it with the deep כַּלְּב֣וּשׁ <WH3830> as [with] a garment כִּסִּית֑וֹ <WH3680> Thou coveredst עַל־ <WH5921> above הָ֝רִ֗ים <WH2022> above the mountains יַֽעַמְדוּ־ <WH5975> stood מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> the waters
מִן־ <WH4480> At גַּעֲרָ֣תְךָ֣ <WH1606> thy rebuke יְנוּס֑וּן <WH5127> they fled מִן־ <WH4480> At ק֥וֹל <WH6963> at the voice רַֽ֝עַמְךָ֗ <WH7482> of thy thunder יֵחָפֵזֽוּן׃ <WH2648> they hasted

יַעֲל֣וּ <WH5927> They go up הָ֭רִים <WH2022> by the mountains יֵרְד֣וּ <WH3381> they go down בְקָע֑וֹת <WH1237> by the valleys אֶל־ <WH413> to מְ֝ק֗וֹם <WH4725> unto the place זֶ֤ה ׀ <WH2088> which יָסַ֬דְתָּ <WH3245> thou hast founded לָהֶֽם׃ <WH1992> like

גְּֽבוּל־ <WH1366> a bound שַׂ֭מְתָּ <WH7760> Thou hast set בַּל־ <WH1077> may not יַֽעֲבֹר֑וּן <WH5674> that they may not pass over בַּל־ <WH1077> they will not יְ֝שׁוּב֗וּן <WH7725> that they turn not again לְכַסּ֥וֹת <WH3680> to cover הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the earth
הַֽמְשַׁלֵּ֣חַ <WH7971> He sendeth מַ֭עְיָנִים <WH4599> the springs בַּנְּחָלִ֑ים <WH5158> into the valleys בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between הָ֝רִ֗ים <WH2022> among the hills יְהַלֵּכֽוּן׃ <WH1980> [which] run

יַ֭שְׁקוּ <WH8248> They give drink כָּל־ <WH3605> to every חַיְת֣וֹ <WH2416> to every beast שָׂדָ֑י <WH7704> of the field יִשְׁבְּר֖וּ <WH7665> quench פְרָאִ֣ים <WH6501> the wild asses צְמָאָֽם׃ <WH6772> their thirst

עֲ֭לֵיהֶם <WH5921> Beside עוֹף־ <WH5775> By them shall the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> of the heaven יִשְׁכּ֑וֹן <WH7931> have their habitation מִבֵּ֥ין <WH996> among עֳ֝פָאיִ֗ם <WH6073> the branches יִתְּנוּ־ <WH5414> lift קֽוֹל׃ <WH6963> up voices

מַשְׁקֶ֣ה <WH8248> He watereth הָ֭רִים <WH2022> the hills מֵעֲלִיּוֹתָ֑יו <WH5944> from his chambers מִפְּרִ֥י <WH6529> with the fruit מַ֝עֲשֶׂ֗יךָ <WH4639> of thy works תִּשְׂבַּ֥ע <WH7646> is satisfied הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the earth

מַצְמִ֤יחַ <WH6779> to grow חָצִ֨יר ׀ <WH2682> He causeth the grass לַבְּהֵמָ֗ה <WH929> for the cattle וְ֭עֵשֶׂב <WH6212> and herb לַעֲבֹדַ֣ת <WH5656> for the service הָאָדָ֑ם <WH120> of man לְה֥וֹצִיא <WH3318> that he may bring forth לֶ֝֗חֶם <WH3899> food מִן־ <WH4480> from הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> out of the earth

וְיַ֤יִן ׀ <WH3196> And wine יְשַׂמַּ֬ח <WH8055> [that] maketh glad לְֽבַב־ <WH3824> the heart אֱנ֗וֹשׁ <WH582> of man לְהַצְהִ֣יל <WH6670> to shine פָּנִ֣ים <WH6440> to make [his] face מִשָּׁ֑מֶן <WH8081> [and] oil וְ֝לֶ֗חֶם <WH3899> and bread לְֽבַב־ <WH3824> heart אֱנ֥וֹשׁ <WH582> man's יִסְעָֽד׃ <WH5582> [which] strengtheneth

יִ֭שְׂבְּעוּ <WH7646> are full עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> The trees יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD אַֽרְזֵ֥י <WH730> [of sap] the cedars לְ֝בָנ֗וֹן <WH3844> of Lebanon אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which נָטָֽע׃ <WH5193> which he hath planted

אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after שָׁ֭ם <WH8033> in it צִפֳּרִ֣ים <WH6833> Where the birds יְקַנֵּ֑נוּ <WH7077> make their nests חֲ֝סִידָ֗ה <WH2624> [as for] the stork בְּרוֹשִׁ֥ים <WH1265> the fir trees בֵּיתָֽהּ׃ <WH1004> [are] her house

הָרִ֣ים <WH2022> hills הַ֭גְּבֹהִים <WH1364> The high לַיְּעֵלִ֑ים <WH3277> for the wild goats סְ֝לָעִ֗ים <WH5553> [and] the rocks מַחְסֶ֥ה <WH4268> [are] a refuge לַֽשְׁפַנִּֽים׃ <WH8227> for the conies
עָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> He appointed יָ֭רֵחַ <WH3394> the moon לְמוֹעֲדִ֑ים <WH4150> for seasons שֶׁ֝֗מֶשׁ <WH8121> the sun יָדַ֥ע <WH3045> knoweth מְבוֹאֽוֹ׃ <WH3996> his going down

תָּֽשֶׁת־ <WH7896> Thou makest חֹ֭שֶׁךְ <WH2822> darkness וִ֣יהִי <WH1961> becomes לָ֑יְלָה <WH3915> and it is night בּֽוֹ־ תִ֝רְמֹ֗שׂ <WH7430> do creep כָּל־ <WH3605> all חַיְתוֹ־ <WH2416> wherein all the beasts יָֽעַר׃ <WH3293> of the forest
הַ֭כְּפִירִים <WH3715> The young lions שֹׁאֲגִ֣ים <WH7580> roar לַטָּ֑רֶף <WH2964> after their prey וּלְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <WH1245> and seek מֵאֵ֣ל <WH410> from God אָכְלָֽם׃ <WH400> their meat

תִּזְרַ֣ח <WH2224> ariseth הַ֭שֶּׁמֶשׁ <WH8121> The sun יֵאָסֵפ֑וּן <WH622> they gather themselves together וְאֶל־ <WH413> in מְ֝עוֹנֹתָ֗ם <WH4585> in their dens יִרְבָּצֽוּן׃ <WH7257> and lay them down
יֵצֵ֣א <WH3318> goeth forth אָדָ֣ם <WH120> Man לְפָעֳל֑וֹ <WH6467> unto his work וְֽלַעֲבֹ֖דָת֣וֹ <WH5656> and to his labour עֲדֵי־ <WH5703> eternity עָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> until the evening

מָֽה־ <WH4100> how רַבּ֬וּ <WH7231> how manifold מַעֲשֶׂ֨יךָ ׀ <WH4639> are thy works יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> O LORD כֻּ֭לָּם <WH3605> all בְּחָכְמָ֣ה <WH2451> in wisdom עָשִׂ֑יתָ <WH6213> hast thou made מָלְאָ֥ה <WH4390> is full הָ֝אָ֗רֶץ <WH776> them all the earth קִנְיָנֶֽךָ׃ <WH7075> of thy riches

זֶ֤ה ׀ <WH2088> There הַיָּ֥ם <WH3220> sea גָּדוֹל֮ <WH1419> [So is] this great וּרְחַ֪ב <WH7342> and broad יָ֫דָ֥יִם <WH3027> In שָֽׁם־ <WH8033> which רֶ֭מֶשׂ <WH7431> wherein [are] things creeping וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> without מִסְפָּ֑ר <WH4557> innumerable חַיּ֥וֹת <WH2416> beasts קְ֝טַנּ֗וֹת <WH6996> both small עִם־ <WH5973> with גְּדֹלֽוֹת׃ <WH1419> and great

שָׁ֭ם <WH8033> There אֳנִיּ֣וֹת <WH591> the ships יְהַלֵּכ֑וּן <WH1980> There go לִ֝וְיָתָ֗ן <WH3882> [there is] that leviathan זֶֽה־ <WH2088> which יָצַ֥רְתָּ <WH3335> [whom] thou hast made לְשַֽׂחֶק־ <WH7832> to play בּֽוֹ׃

כֻּ֭לָּם <WH3605> all אֵלֶ֣יךָ <WH413> about יְשַׂבֵּר֑וּן <WH7663> These wait לָתֵ֖ת <WH5414> all upon thee that thou mayest give אָכְלָ֣ם <WH400> [them] their meat בְּעִתּֽוֹ׃ <WH6256> in due season

תִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> [That] thou givest לָ֭הֶם <WH1992> they יִלְקֹט֑וּן <WH3950> them they gather תִּפְתַּ֥ח <WH6605> thou openest יָֽ֝דְךָ֗ <WH3027> thine hand יִשְׂבְּע֥וּן <WH7646> they are filled טֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> with good

תַּסְתִּ֥יר <WH5641> Thou hidest פָּנֶיךָ֮ <WH6440> thy face יִֽבָּהֵ֫ל֥וּן <WH926> they are troubled תֹּסֵ֣ף <WH622> thou takest away ר֭וּחָם <WH7307> their breath יִגְוָע֑וּן <WH1478> they die וְֽאֶל־ <WH413> to עֲפָרָ֥ם <WH6083> to their dust יְשׁוּבֽוּן׃ <WH7725> and return

תְּשַׁלַּ֣ח <WH7971> Thou sendest ר֭וּחֲךָ <WH7307> forth thy spirit יִבָּרֵא֑וּן <WH1254> they are created וּ֝תְחַדֵּ֗שׁ <WH2318> and thou renewest פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> the face אֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> of the earth

יְהִ֤י <WH1961> endure כְב֣וֹד <WH3519> The glory יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD לְעוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> shall endure for ever יִשְׂמַ֖ח <WH8055> shall rejoice יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD בְּמַעֲשָֽׂיו׃ <WH4639> in his works
הַמַּבִּ֣יט <WH5027> He looketh לָ֭אָרֶץ <WH776> on the earth וַתִּרְעָ֑ד <WH7460> and it trembleth יִגַּ֖ע <WH5060> he toucheth בֶּהָרִ֣ים <WH2022> the hills וְֽיֶעֱשָֽׁנוּ׃ <WH6225> and they smoke

אָשִׁ֣ירָה <WH7891> I will sing לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto the LORD בְּחַיָּ֑י <WH2416> as long as I live אֲזַמְּרָ֖ה <WH2167> I will sing לֵאלֹהַ֣י <WH430> praise to my God בְּעוֹדִֽי׃ <WH5750> while I have my being
יֶעֱרַ֣ב <WH6149> of him shall be sweet עָלָ֣יו <WH5921> and שִׂיחִ֑י <WH7879> My meditation אָ֝נֹכִ֗י <WH595> I אֶשְׂמַ֥ח <WH8055> I will be glad בַּיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> in the LORD

יִתַּ֤מּוּ <WH8552> be consumed חַטָּאִ֨ים ׀ <WH2400> Let the sinners מִן־ <WH4480> from הָאָ֡רֶץ <WH776> out of the earth וּרְשָׁעִ֤ים ׀ <WH7563> and let the wicked ע֤וֹד <WH5750> more אֵינָ֗ם <WH369> be no בָּרֲכִ֣י <WH1288> be no more Bless נַ֭פְשִׁי <WH5315> O my soul אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> thou the LORD הַֽלְלוּ־ <WH1984> Praise יָֽהּ׃ <WH3050> ye the LORD
